name: "Sonic Underground" Chronology Part 1 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: The opening episode of the series "Sonic Underground" introduces us to Sonic the Hedgehog and his two siblings, Sonia and Manic. Their mother, the queen, is forced to give them up to protect them. What kingdom is she the queen of?
questions.explanation:
Mobius.

	Queen Aleena was the disposed ruler of the planet Mobius, forced into hiding when Dr. Robotnick conquered the planet. She split up her three children and put them with other families to protect them from persecution when she went into hiding. The series is set in different continuity from other "Sonic" games and television series.

questions.text: In the second episode of the series, the map the triplets were following was destroyed during a fight with some bounty hunters. Sonia then reveals to her brothers that the map isn't gone forever; why wasn't it?
options: It was only a copy, she still had the original.
There was a video with the map displayed large enough to read.
questions.explanation:
She has a photographic memory.

	The triplets had been separated at birth and only reconnected in the later portion of the pilot episode. She had to reveal the information about herself to her brothers. After finding out both Sonic and Manic poked fun at her for it, but in the end her fantastic memory bore out to be useful.

questions.text: The third episode opens with the siblings battling what type of mythical creature?
questions.explanation:
A dragon.

	The siblings are battling the monster, and just when things look grim Manic discovers his secret power. Manic can cause elemental damage by moving the Earth. Of course as soon as the fight is won, the dragon disappears and we find out that it was only a training exercise.

questions.text: While enjoying a day out together in episode four, Sonic introduces his siblings to his favorite food. What is it?
questions.explanation:
Chili dogs.

	Sonic has had a passion for chili dogs since the first episode, but while walking through downtown Robotropolis he runs across a hot dog cart and decides to have his brother and sister try them. Neither of them seamed to like them. Sonia didn't want the peasant food and Manic was more worried about stealing money (He was raised to be a pickpocket) from the cart.

questions.text:
In the fifth episode, the gang continues the search for their mother. One of the ways they search is by singing a song asking people "Have you _________?" 
Fill in the  blank.
questions.explanation:
got the 4-1-1.

	The catchy tune "Have you got the 4-1-1" was sung twice during the episode as the trio continued to look for Queen Aleena. Of course singing the song only started the adventure, as they were tricked into looking in a seedy underground swamp for their missing matriarch.

questions.text: While visiting an alternate dimension in the sixth episode, Manic was arrested for stealing a green apple.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Manic, as per his usual, did attempt to steal the apple. The hitch was the woman running the fruit stand took it from him and gave him a different one which was "more ripe" according to her. Everything in that dimension was free for the needs of whoever could use it.

questions.text: In the seventh episode, Sonia gets so fed up with the fighting and searching for her mother that she needs some time off. She heads to east Mobius to visit a friend and get some M & M. What is it she's seeking?
options: Candies that melt in your mouth
questions.explanation:
Manicures and Massage.

	While Sonia tries to take time to herself for rest and relaxation, her brothers seek to find the queen. Of course the show focuses on the trio working together, so it isn't long before Sonia is brought back into the fold before getting to completely enjoy her manicure or massage.

questions.text: In the eighth episode, the siblings meet up with some misguided youths. What were the younglings doing?
questions.explanation:
Pick-pocketing and robbing others.

	It is a return to the streets for Manic, who was raised among similar circumstances. Eventually Manic, Sonic and Sonia teach the children the error of their ways and help them become better members of society.

questions.text: Episode 9 sees Sonic and his siblings destroying processing plants. It's mentioned very early in the episode that they have destroyed how many plants in the last four weeks?
questions.explanation:
3.

	The processing plants are where the series villain Dr. Robotnick has his mechanical Swat Bots built and maintained. Sonic is shown destroying one in the pilot, then in this episode it's mentioned that they have destroyed three in the last four weeks.

questions.text: The 10th episode, called "The Deepest Fear", refers to Sonic's own deep seated fear of what?
questions.explanation:
Water.

	Sonic refuses to admit to his fear of the water at the beginning of the episode. The show opens with Sonic having a nightmare that he is a ship captain fighting a giant octopus. He wakes up muttering about not being able to swim. Later in the episode we find out that Sonic wears special anti-gravity shoes that allow him to run across the surface of the water, and because of that he never learned to swim.
